title: Brown & White Colorblock Linen Shirt Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a women's shirt dress in brown and white colorblock design, isolated on plain white background, high-detail linen texture, visible stitching, button placket, waist tie belt, short sleeves, crisp collar, mid-length hem, no model, no mannequin, no human, apparel-only
style_fit: relaxed fit with adjustable waist tie
techpack: A-line shirt dress constructed from linen-cotton blend with brown and white colorblock panels; short sleeves with turned-up cuffs; front button placket with mother-of-pearl buttons; classic shirt collar; self-fabric waist tie belt; mid-length hem; double topstitching for durability.
provenance: Designed by combining trending brown and white palette for a versatile, commercial-ready casual dress.
design_text:
Brown & White Colorblock Linen Shirt Dress (BRWH-001)
